alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 9:26AM AKST until December 01 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting to 30 mph. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to noon AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts may form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will be on the North Slopes of the Alaska Range. Northwest winds gusting to 30 mph tonight will cause blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
